thread.title: Cinq E'toiles New York Launch
thread.title_full: Cinq E'toiles New York Launch - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Cinq E'toiles New York Launch
text:
Cinq E'toiles New York Launch
Manhattan, NY, July 07, 2015 --( PR.com )-- ARIDO, a closely guarded secret, the world's most exclusive and discrete jewelry.
Founded by a scion of the Raphael family jewelers dating back to the 11th century with Mr. Chappell a world class designer with a background in fashion, art, and history.
Descending from a very large family, the Moussaieffs, with many members.
They include Shlomo Moussaieff of London, who is a jewelry dealer, his daughter Dorrit Moussaieff who is married to the President of Iceland, Jeffrey Moussaieff Masson, famous author, the grandson of Henri Moussiaeff.
And Jesse Raphael world-renowned precious stone specialist is another great grandson of the family patriarch.
ARIDO, like the Moussaieffs and Lawrence Graff, are known to pay top prices for rare gems.
Celebrity Guru Thomas Chappell knows what it takes to get on the A-list.
The two global citizens are the owners of the exclusive brand.
ARIDO protege singer and actress Adrianna Edwards has created the highly anticipated luxury brand, Cinq E'toiles.
The global launching will take place at the Baccarat New York, July 2015.
Invitation Only.
Fine Art jewelry created with the highest quality gems and precious metals in the world.
Timeless, handcrafted pieces to treasure forever. info@cinqetoiles.uk
